Effects.Full:
Movement Reduction II: Reduces Movement Speed by 2 tiles. This is considered as a movement type debuff

Sated: Increases ATK by 15% DEF. Extends the effective range of Flexible Modification to the entire battlefield. This effect cannot be dispelled        

Cover: Decreases damage dealt to Stability Gauge by 2 points; 1 layer is consumed for every 1 instance of damage to Stability Gauge received. Can be stacked up to a maximum of 3 layers

Undercurrent: Applies Dampness on enemies on this tile after the end of their action for 2 turns, and inflicts Turbid weakness on the enemy standing on it after the end of their action. This tile is considered as an Turbid type tile

Dampness: Decreases healing received by 40%, after this effect is stacked twice, this effect changes to Stasis for 2 turns. This is considered as a Turbid type debuff

Stasis: Unable to receive any healing. This is considered as a Turbid type debuff

Counter: Attacks once. Cannot be triggered by Ambush, Counter, or Support attacks

Extra Command: Can execute any action except for movement

Taunt: Unable to be controlled. Forced to use normal attack against the unit that applied this effect. Effect is dispelled when the unit that applied this effect dies

Basic.Description: Selects an enemy target within a 6 tile radius and deals Physical damage equivalent to 80% ATK to it

Skill.SkillName:
Delicious Feast

(Skill / AoE / Debuff / Recovers Stability)
Skill.Description: Selects an enemy target within a 6 tile radius and deals AoE Turbid damage equivalent to 80% ATK to all enemies within a 2 tile radius of the target, and applies Movement Reduction II for 2 turns. For each target hit, increases Stability Gauge by 2 points
Skill.Vertebrae 1: If this skill only hit 1 target, recovers Stability Gauge by 6 points
Skill.Fixed Key 2: Delicious Feast: Changes the effective range to a 1 tile radius. The skill targets a specific tile instead of an enemy, and pulls all enemies within range towards the center of the tile by 1 tile, and increases damage dealt to 100% ATK

Skill2.SkillName:
Meal Preparation

(Skill / AoE / Debuff / Cover Destruction)
Skill2.Description: Selects 1 direction and deals Turbid damage equivalent to 70% ATK to all enemies within a 3x6 tile range in the direction, and applies Movement Reduction II for 2 turns. This skill also destroys all destructible cover within skill range, except for a 3x3 range of self
Skill2.Vertebrae 3: Deals Turbid damage equivalent to 70% → 80% ATK
Skill2.Fixed Key 4: Meal Preparation: Changes the effective range to 5 tiles radius of self. The skill no longer applies Movement Reduction II, and applies Taunt on 2 enemies for 1 turn. Increases the cooldown of the skill to 3 turns

Ultimate.Description: Applies 2 layers of Cover for all allies and enters into Sated state for 3 turns. When in Sated state, if an enemy dealt single target damage to an ally within attack range, Sabrina activates Counter against the enemy, dealing Physical damage equivalent to 80% ATK and 4 Stability Damage to it. This effect can be triggered up to 3 times per round
Ultimate.Vertebrae 3:
Sated: Increases ATK by 15% → 25% DEF
Counter: Deals 4 → 6 Stability Damage
Ultimate.Vertebrae 5: No longer consumes Contamination Gauge. Gains an instance of Extra Command

Passive.Description:
Before an ally is attacked, if the ally is within a 7 tile radius of self, applies 1 layer of Cover on the ally. This effect can be triggered four times in a turn. For each instance of damage dealt, increases Contamination Gauge by 1 point. 

After activating a skill, creates Undercurrent on the effective range of the skill. If there is an Turbid type tile within range, triggers Tile Reaction and removes the effect of the tile, dealing fixed damage equivalent to 20% ATK to the enemy on the tile
Passive.Vertebrae 4: Increases the number of times Cover can be applied on an ally by 2
Passive.Vertebrae 6: When Contamination Gauge is at maximum, decreases Contamination Gauge by 4 points and increases skill damage by 30%

1.Effect: Increases the number of times Cover can be applied on an ally by 2

2.Effect: Deals Turbid damage equivalent to 70% → 80% ATK

3.Effect: If this skill only hit 1 target, recovers Stability Gauge by 6 points

4.Effect:
Sated: Increases ATK by 15% → 25% DEF
Counter: Deals 4 → 6 Stability Damage

5.Effect: No longer consumes Contamination Gauge. Gains an instance of Extra Command

6.Effect: When Contamination Gauge is at maximum, decreases Contamination Gauge by 4 points and increases skill damage by 30%

7.Effect: When receiving damage, increases DEF by 20%

8.Effect: At the start of the battle, increases Contamination Gauge by 3 points

9.Effect: While on Turbid type tiles, increases DEF by 30%, and nullifies displacement effects and all debuffs from Turbid type tiles

10.Effect: When Contamination Gauge is not at maximum, recovers 2 Stability for each point of Contamination Gauge gained

11.Effect: Delicious Feast: Changes the effective range to a 1 tile radius. The skill targets a specific tile instead of an enemy, and pulls all enemies within range towards the center of the tile by 1 tile, and increases damage dealt to 100% ATK

12.Effect: Meal Preparation: Changes the effective range to 5 tiles radius of self. The skill no longer applies Movement Reduction II, and applies Taunt on 2 enemies for 1 turn. Increases the cooldown of the skill to 3 turns

13.Effect: DEF +5.0% / When dealing single target damage, applies Movement Reduction II for 1 turn
